column1: # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=The first time I took a bath , I enjoyed it so much that I did not want to stop .
#text=It felt like I was sitting in a pool of warm water .
#text=I was a young kid so it was a bubble bath and I had some toys to play with .
#text=Either my mother or my father would wash my hair for me then they would help me wash the remainder of my body .
#text=But they just told me not to splash the water and to keep the water in the tub .
#text=I would play with my toys and get all clean in the bath tub .
#text=After a few years I learned how to wash my own hair and I would prefer to take a bath over a shower since it was more fun to sit and relax in the warm water and enjoy a fun evening .
#text=From the best of my memory , I remember that I always loved taking a bath .
#text=Then when I am done in the bath tub , I would get out and wrap up in a huge dry cotton towel and dry off !
